name: Umbra Halloween
description:
Nick lost his sister Kate one year ago. People say the witch in the woods curses people to take their own lives, Nick decides to find her, she must have a way to bring them back to life too.

"On the night of Halloween the dead rise to curse the ones who are still alive."

The forest is dark and cold, but the clues leading to the witch's cabin are clear. Explore the forest, witch's garden, her cabin and further down this mysterious path, to find a way to bring Kate back from the dead. Collect the herbs, candles, and various mysterious items in the witch's house where the environment turns surreal the further you go. Make potions and cast your spell.

This Halloween horror game dives deep into the mysteries and stories of All Hallows' origins, traditions, various items and methods that were used to connect with the dead. The traditions also turn into modern surrealism and psychological horror to bring you a very unique Halloween-themed experience.
